Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How are you doing, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: "You were the one who called for me, weren't you?", 3: '6'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I was. And our partnership went very smoothly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Which is why I think I should return something to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Take a look at this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are those... the daggers from before?', 3: '11'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'They are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you remember our conversation from last time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have unusable daggers in your tent.', 3: '14', 4: 'You were going to give me a taste of your metal fist.', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Happy to oblige.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No. It was about why I had these daggers in my tent.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do they mean something special to you?', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Nostalgia, I suppose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Does it represent your memories of the Golden Age?', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...What makes you think so?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'An old general I met once used that word in a speech.', 3: '23'}
{2: "He said that nostalgia meant a person couldn't fully let go.", 3: '24'}
{2: 'It meant they were still missing their good old days.', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Hah. Was it Hans?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You know him?', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I knew it was him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We've met, nothing more. He had this tone in his voice when he spoke to other people, so it made an impression.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Can't let go... of my good old days... Hah.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ah. Are we getting a flashback?', 3: '32', 4: 'Are we getting a history lesson on your life, pops?', 5: '33'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't get stirred up by a joke like this anymore. Where did you learn to speak like that, though?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Ahem. Never mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I was just wondering if I should find someone to protect these good memories.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you mean?', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is what I wanted to give you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hans was right. These daggers represent the memories of my past.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But carrying so many memories makes it harder for one to move forward and strike swiftly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So... I want to keep them with you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's more important to seize the day than to linger in the past.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And an important keepsake can only be entrusted to someone equally important.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Aren't you worried that I'll lose them?", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's not something valuable to begin with. I'll live.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I can finally let go of the past when that happens.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If you're planning to throw them away, I'll respect your decision.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "After everything we've been through, I trust you.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll keep them safe.", 3: '52'}
{2: 'Until the day you ask for them back.', 3: '53'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hah. What a charmer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "In return, I'll also do my best to protect you until that day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Because I know that the days I spend with you will one day become my cherished memories.', 4: '1'}
